Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory295.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'The scorching sensation still lingers on your back. The dizziness is taking a while to fade away.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Cough... cough... Watanabe, Commandant, Jada... Are you guys okay?'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Aargh! Your cloak is on fire, Watanabe!'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "Why don't you start dragging people away instead of yelling?"}
{3: 'You feel yourself dragged away as the heat around you gradually dissipates.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory757.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Are you alright?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You take the hand he offers and stand up.'}
{3: 'Both Zong and Watanabe have varying degrees of burns on their backs, unlike Jada and you, who are basically unharmed.'}
{3: 'If they did not react in time, they would not have been able to stand back up after just a few coughs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Thug A', 3: "Aaargh! We're doomed!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A thug who has arrived late kneels on the ground, crying.'}
{2: 'Strange Thug A', 3: 'Who the hell started the fire?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Thug A', 3: "Was it you guys... Wait! Isn't that the uniform of the Forsaken?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'His gaze fixes on Zong, who is wearing a combat uniform.'}
{2: 'Strange Thug A', 3: 'You must have started the fire!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The thug keeps on cursing Zong, ignoring the three of you.'}
{2: 'Strange Thug A', 3: "The mayor didn't let you in, so you sneaked in to cause trouble, didn't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "No... I've been here for a long time...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Thug A', 3: 'Oh? So it was premeditated!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Thug A', 3: "I knew the previous Forsaken attack didn't come out of nowhere!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Can you tell me more about it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Thug A', 3: 'Who are you? You look like a Construct... Do they all look like this nowadays?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Thug A', 3: "Don't you mess around! I've already called for backup!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll explain everything, but please first tell me what's been happening with the Forsaken recently.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fann', 3: "Let's discuss it somewhere else.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A young man wearing a cowboy hat walks over quickly.'}
{2: 'Fann', 3: "The rest of you stay here to put out the fire. I'll take them to see the old man.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The wooden room is still covered in slash marks. Max sits at the desk, listening to the few of you recounting what just happened.'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "So, they're finally looking here...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "I'm sorry, 【kuroname】, but I'm afraid New Oakley can no longer shelter you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "The Forsaken used to maintain a facade of politeness with us, but they're going all out without any pretense this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's okay. At least we've achieved our goal.", 3: '71'}
{2: 'Thank you for the gear and the personnel you provided.', 3: '72'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "I can't take credit for that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Max shakes his head and looks at Watanabe.'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Folks like Jada and all the equipment were rescued and salvaged by the Forsaken during that disaster.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'They chose to stay here afterward because they realized those of us on the surface valued them more, unlike those living in Eden.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "Although I haven't met you in person before, I've heard many stories about you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...I couldn't have saved those people alone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "There's no need for modesty here. You've earned the right to hold your head high.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "I've been observing from the sidelines. No matter what you think of the attack, I can assure you that many made the same choice as yours because of your influence.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'And you and your followers have saved more people because of it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "I believe that's why Ballard used your death to incite them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Mutual benefits are a great way to bring people together, but mutual hatred forges a stronger bond.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'For the Forsaken, your death provided the perfect spark to ignite their hatred.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Can you update me on the current situation?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "It's not a long story. Ballard gradually took over disputed areas under the guise of searching for you and self-preservation during the six months you disappeared.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'There were frictions between Babylonia and the Forsaken during this time, but they were more or less resolved under orders from the higher-ups of both sides.', 4: '1'}
{3: "He glances at Watanabe's repaired Epitaph frame."}
{2: 'Max', 3: "I assume the Forsaken doesn't normally reveal their true strength, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Perhaps Ballard gradually revealed his cards during this process, forcing Babylonia to reassess him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's not that simple...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "I don't mean to pry.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Max shakes his head and continues.'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'The situation changed last week. After securing another area, Ballard suddenly announced your death and called on all Forsaken to liberate the conservation area.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Many were incited, though some opposed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "Those who opposed were summoned to Ballard's new headquarters, and they haven't been heard from since.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Both the Forsaken and Babylonia are now amassing troops at the border. No one knows who will fire the first shot.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "I'm just an outsider. That's all I know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "I assume you'll be discussing what your next steps should be, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Max stands up and walks toward the door.'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'You can have the room for now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He closes the door, leaving the three of you inside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong', 3: 'Um... Should I leave too?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Shall we head to the border together?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Should we split up?', 3: '117'}
{3: 'You both give opposite answers almost simultaneously.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's too dangerous for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What kind of person is Ballard?', 3: '120'}
{3: "Instead of refuting Watanabe's concern, you ask about the name you have only heard a few times."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "He can't turn a blind eye to what he opposes, but he never acts recklessly. If he has revealed his true intention, he must be prepared for success.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Then he must know about the Longinus Arsenal.', 3: '123'}
{2: "And he wouldn't have gambled on Babylonia not using it.", 3: '124'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If he has a way to counter Babylonia, he hasn't told me about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Whatever it is...', 3: '126'}
{2: 'It must be as dangerous as the Longinus Arsenal.', 3: '127'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's the only way he can pose an equal threat to Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's why you must find out what it is and stop him.", 3: '129'}
{2: 'I will explain everything at the border.', 3: '130'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong', 3: "Hey, haven't you been avoiding the Babylonians, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: "That was because I couldn't be sure who I could trust.", 3: '134'}
{3: "But it's different if a large troop is at the border."}
{2: 'The masterminds may control one conservation area...', 3: '137'}
{3: "But they can't control all the frontline soldiers."}
{2: "I'm safer when there are more witnesses.", 3: '139'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Then let Zong go with you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I know you think it's more dangerous where I'm going, but hear me out first.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "First, having Zong represent the Forsaken is more convincing. We still don't know what Ballard's and Babylonia's orders are, and we need to keep both sides calm.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Second, Zong can keep you safe on the road. None of this matters if you can't reach your destination.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You have me convinced.', 3: '152'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You didn't make it easy.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Max', 3: "Looks like you've made your decision.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Max tosses a shiny object over.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Max', 3: "It's old, but it still runs well. You're going to need transportation, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "Unfortunately, it's the only one I have...", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's more than enough. Thank you.", 3: '165'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "You've all saved this town in different ways. This is nothing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Looks like I have to ask you to stop a war again.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{3: "The jeep drives steadily on the rugged path. According to the map, you have to pass through a forest to reach the border, while the route to Ballard's location is along old highways."}
{3: 'So Watanabe insists on dropping you and Zong near the forest before heading directly to Ballard to confront him.'}
{2: 'Something on your mind?', 3: '177'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_02.jpg'}
{3: 'You turn and see Watanabe resting one hand on the car window and looking somewhat distracted.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...How much of my memory have you seen during the connection?', 18: '100002872'}
{2: 'Almost all of it?', 3: '182', 4: 'Just a little bit...', 5: '184'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Can't you be a bit more tactful about it? There goes my privacy.", 18: '100002873'}
{3: 'He "complains."'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll take your word for it.", 18: '100002874'}
{3: 'He smiles ambiguously.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'In that case, you should understand why Forsaken was created and what Babylonia had done.', 18: '100002875'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'How do you feel about Babylonia now?', 18: '100002876'}
{2: 'Nothing in particular.', 3: '190', 4: "It's a place I need to protect.", 5: '191', 6: "I can't stand it! I wish I could blow it up!", 7: '192'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You wouldn't have suggested splitting up if that's true.", 18: '100002877'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Even if it isn't the paradise it's claimed to be?", 18: '100002878'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'd be convinced if you looked more angry.", 18: '100002879'}
{2: "I don't think I'll give it up no matter what.", 3: '194'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Not giving it up, huh...', 18: '100002880'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Zong told me a little bit about your situation earlier.', 18: '100002881'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "A place that doesn't really need you and could betray you any second... Why would you want to save it?", 18: '100002882'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Is it for the people you care about, those who are still alive?', 18: '100002883'}
{3: 'He seems to be asking you as well as himself.'}
{2: 'Even without meeting Lucia and the others...', 3: '200'}
{2: 'I would still go back.', 3: '201'}
{3: 'Your unexpected answer makes him pause and wait for you to continue.'}
{2: "Because we're born there.", 3: '204'}
{3: "Even if it isn't perfect and needs to change..."}
{2: 'If we all choose to run away...', 3: '206'}
{2: 'Who will be there to change it?', 3: '207'}
{2: "Didn't you make the same choice?", 3: '208'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "Perhaps humanity's future really is up there, but we still don't want to give up the soil we walk on...", 4: '1', 18: '100002891'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory427.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: 'Humanity will take back our home, no matter how long it takes and what it costs.', 4: '1', 18: '100002890'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_01.jpg'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Right. I almost forgot why I chose to stay.', 18: '100002885'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "They made the same choice because of the same simple reason, didn't they?", 18: '100002886'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's simple, which is why it's unyielding and dazzling.", 18: '100002887'}
{3: 'The confusion and doubt he has from the betrayal vanishes in an instant, and he chuckles softly.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'How unfortunate. I was going to invite you to join the Forsaken.', 18: '100002888'}
{2: "I'll take it as a joke?", 3: '228'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{3: 'The vehicle gradually stops at the entrance to the forest, and your short journey together comes to an end.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong', 3: "We'll get off here, then, Watanabe.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You step off the jeep, your feet standing on the muddy ground once more.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Be careful out there.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You call out to him just as he is about to leave.'}
{2: "We'll succeed, right?", 3: '245'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yeah. You have my word.', 4: '2'}
